definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: III. [[פרשׁ]] (√ of foll.; cf. Aram. [[פְּרַת]] Pa. (rare) cause to break or [[התרטׂ תסרבֻ]] (a serpent its brood), [[פַּרְתָּא]] dung; Syr. prat Pa. rip open, perto0 = 1. [[פֶּרֶשׁ]]; Ar. fara3a IV. rip open stomach, and scatter contents (cf. VII), far3un = I. [[פֶּרֶשׁ]]).
